headline.main: How Rich We Are! And Yet How Poor

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Oh, how rich we Americans have become! Our private net worth after discounting for inflation has increased over the last 50 years by fivefold. On a per capita basis and in real (inflation-corrected) terms, Americans are three times richer than we were 50 years ago.
